title: Why is communication important? Why do we communicate using technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: How do we get information? Through communication right? So, communication helps to send information but how are we going to send information to a person that live far from us? Using technology. That is why mobile phones and even smartphones now keep evolving to improve our communication. Not only smartphones but also Internet.

Without speaking the truth with love, asking good questions, listening with understanding, and thinking in silence, nothing much important would happen. Please read the TRUE HAPPINESS PLAN on the Center Of Unconditional Love website and respond with love.
